      • convert

      • get

        @Nullable
public T get(PersistentDataHolder holder)
        Gets the setting value for the given data holder. If the setting isn't set for the given holder, the default value is used. If the setting isn't set and the default value is absent, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        holder - The data holder to test the setting on
        Returns:
        The set value, default value, or null
